executable.title: Generation of DWI
executable.description: Software phantom that is human brain like for evaluating tractography algorithms
executable.contributor: Gwendoline Roger, Martin Styner, Yundi Shi, Clement Vachet

image.name: EigenFilename
image.label: Input Eigen Values
image.description: File containing eigenvalues used to estimate diffusion in restricted part, structure of the file:for each voxel three eigenvalues of fibers contained in this voxel

image.name: foImgFilename
image.label: Input fiber orientations
image.description: File containing fiber orientations in each voxel, structure of the txt file:for each voxel three coordinates of the vector representing fiber orientations contained in this voxel; exemple : x,y,z of the first fiber in voxel 1 then x, y, z of the second fiber in the same voxel 1 ...

image.name: EigenHinderedImgFilename
image.label: Input Eigen Values and Eigen Vectors for hindered part
image.description: File containing eigenvalues and eigenvectors used to estimate diffusion in hindered part, structure of the txt file: an average of tensors in each voxel was done and then for each voxel three eigenvalues of this average contained in this voxel then coordinates of the three eigenvectors of this tensor average

parameters.label: Parameters New DWI
parameters.description: Parameters to reconstruct the new DWI

double.name: WidthPulseGradient
double.description: Give the diffusion gradient duration in [seconds]

double.name: MagnitudeG
double.label: strength_of_the_diffusion_weighting_gradient
double.description: Give the strength of the diffusion weighting gradient in [mT/T]

float.name: fH
float.label: T2-weighted volume fraction of the hindered compartments

float.name: fR
float.label: T2-weighted volume fraction of the restricted compartments

double.name: noiseSigma
double.label: noise sigma
double.description: Give a sigma if you want to add Rician Noise
